channel.title: [RS2][SRL] Remmington AnyOre PowerMiner [ ~ ]
channel.description:
Hey Everyone, Yet, Another Production with the Powermining part based off my PowerMiner :D Progress Reports pl0x :) Any Bugs/Errors please report in this thread or PM me if you wish.
{.Script Info: # ScriptName = Remmington AnyOre Powerminer # Author = Surajd # Description = Mines any ore in Remmington Mines # Version = v1.00 # Date = 27/07/06 (v1.00) # Comments = - Have your Pickaxe WIELDED! - Start anywhere in the Mine - Setup Lines are 27-43 - Set the Rock Colors (Lines 20-24) if the script doesn't find - /Script Info}
Cheers, Surajd ;)

item.title: [RS2][SRL] Remmington AnyOre PowerMiner [ ~ ]
item.dc:creator: @cardboardcorn cardboardcorn
item.description:
@cardboardcorn wrote:

ill test and give u a progress in like 10 mins ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 02:37:09 PM[/size][hr]my computer just died … like shut off by itself -.-, well ill try it now lol [br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 02:58:27 PM[/size][hr]I got
Worked for 8 Minutes and 6 Seconds

Mined: 43 Ore(s)!
Dropped: 1 Load(s)!
Encountered: 0 Fight(s)!
NextPlayer
goth ninja
Successfully executed

I had to end it because when it tried to log in , it didnt type my name and pass, it just click username, did nothing for a sec , clicked pass , did nothing for a sec , then clicked enter. I think that was an error on my part lol
Very good script, worked pretty flawlessly (for 8 minutes) i’ll give a better progress report l8er … Im going to the beach , I’ll leave it on while im there. Cya

~Cardboardcorn~
[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 03:16:47 PM[/size][hr]everytime I run it i put in all my details but it doesnt put em in when i log out

Starting to PowerMine!
55% change.
Found Gas, Gas-Protection Activated!
Dropping Ores…

<============== -v1.00 by Surajd- Report ===============>
Worked for 8 Minutes and 11 Seconds

Mined: 43 Ore(s)!
Dropped: 1 Load(s)!
Encountered: 0 Fight(s)!
NextPlayer
goth ninja
Successfully executed
